column1: Forecasts of road traffic in England and vehicles in Great Britain 1

1 The traffic forecasts are central forecasts taken from the Department's Road Transport Forecasts for England 2011, which is available on the website at: http://www.dft.gov.uk/publications/road-transport-forecasts-2011/. The published paper also contains a forecast range reflecting uncertainties in the key forecasting assumptions that affect travel demand; and a break down of the forecasts by region.
column9: Source: Transport Appraisal and Startegic Modelling

column1: 3 Car Ownership Data is taken from the NTEM dataset (Ver 6.1). More detailed data can be obtained from the TEMPRO website: www.dft.gov.uk/tempro
The figures in this table are not National Statistics.
